questionEn: I want to eat some bread.

I’m buying some tomatoes.
Do you want some soup?

We’re making some rice.
I drink some mineral water.

questionFr: Nous prenons ______ argent pour le voyage.
questionEn: We are taking some money for the trip.
He orders some pizza.
Do you want some chocolate?
I eat some vegetables.
Do you have some olive oil?
He drinks some milk.
We are buying some fruit at the market.
They are having some ice cream.

questionFr: Elle a acheté ______ oranges au supermarché.
questionEn: She bought some oranges at the supermarket.
We want some fresh bread.
Are you drinking some sparkling water?

questionFr: Il mange toujours ______ fromage le soir.
questionEn: He always eats some cheese in the evening.

questionFr: Vous prenez ______ confiture avec vos crêpes?
questionEn: Do you have some jam with your crepes?
We cooked some green beans.

questionFr: J’ai mis ______ huile sur la salade.
questionEn: I put some oil on the salad.

questionFr: Elles mangent ______ riz tous les jours.
questionEn: They eat rice every day.

questionFr: Il achète ______ bananes pour ses enfants.
questionEn: He is buying some bananas for his kids.
I want to drink some hot coffee.
She is having some green salad.
We eat some strawberries in the summer.

questionFr: Tu as mis ______ eau dans la bouteille?
questionEn: Did you put some water in the bottle?

questionFr: Il boit toujours ______ lait au petit déjeuner.
questionEn: He always drinks some milk at breakfast.
Are you cooking some pasta tonight?
We are eating some grilled fish.
I’m buying some flour for the cake.
They drank some cold water.

questionFr: Il commande ______ croissants à la boulangerie.
questionEn: He orders some croissants at the bakery.
